text:
I still stick to these as Top 3 #antivirals mid-term based on *my own analysis:

▶️ #remdesivir trial in 🇨🇳 looks good + Nebraska running their own https://t.co/StGVSH18wF

▶️ #favilavir approved in 🇨🇳 -  clinical trials ongoing in 🇹🇼 /🇯🇵

▶️ data on #chloroquine looks decent too https://t.co/ZAK1jyJ9pE
